name: Director of Applications Development
experience: More than or equals to 10 years
desc:
Altigen Communications, a leader in UC communications platform
products, is seeking a Director of Applications Development to lead our Asia engineering
team and contribute to our strategic success and expansion in the global marketplace.
The ideal candidate will lead multiple groups of engineers to develop Azure-based
communications software for Microsoft Teams. 
He/she needs to have strong leadership and management skills, solid
domain expertise in telecom, networking and Microsoft based communications, along
with experience in the full Software Development Life Cycle.  
ResponsibilitiesManage multiple Agile development groups and provide technical guidance to EngineersArchitect, design and develop software for Altigen's leading edge UC communications solutions for Microsoft TeamsCreate Software Specifications based on customer and market requirements Manage existing product sustaining and interact with QA and Technical Support
